snippet: Sheik Hassan Nasrallah, the leader of Hezbollah, said members of his party were behind a bombing last week that wounded four Israeli soldiers.
abstract: Hezbollah leader Sheik Hassan Nasrallah says members of his party are behind a bombing that wounded four Israeli soldiers inside Lebanon.
lead_paragraph: Sheik Hassan Nasrallah, the leader of Hezbollah, said members of his party were behind a bombing last week that wounded four Israeli soldiers.

headline.main: Hezbollah Claims Bombing That Wounded 4 Israeli Soldiers
headline.print_headline: Hezbollah Claims Bombing That Wounded 4 Israeli Soldiers, Saying They Were in Lebanon
